lender.name: Daniel
lender.loan_because: it\'s the right thing to do.
lender.occupational_info: I am an analyst for Housing at the University of California in Santa Barbara. I also work for an organic farmer on weekends.

lender.name: Philip
lender.loan_because: Everyone deserves a opportunity to succeed. I\'ve been fortunate in my life circumstances - I want to help others have an opportunity too.
lender.occupational_info: I work with other employees in our business to configure our database software so that it helps them do their jobs more easily.

lender.name: Karla
lender.loan_because: I only have a small amount in the bank, but some people need it more than I do.
lender.occupational_info: I study insects that feed on our crops and try to find ways to control them without pesticides.

lender.name: Charles
lender.loan_because: I think microcredit is a very successful way of helping people in developing countries. Using Kiva is fun. I am anxious to watch the entrepeneurs that I have helped succeed.
lender.occupational_info: I believe that the disparities in income which are so great in developing countries is one of the greatest problems the world faces. I am retired living in Guanajuato, Mexico. I am probably not in physical condition to help build houses or the like, but with Kiva I can help others.

lender.name: Steven
lender.loan_because: Teach a man to fish...

lender.name: defenestrated
lender.loan_because: Microloans strike me as the most direct way to give individuals the economic power they need in order to overcome oppressive circumstances. Also, as someone with limited funds available, it's great to be able to keep some money continuously at work through Kiva even when I'm not able to give to humanitarian causes on an ongoing basis.

lender.name: matt
lender.loan_because: the borrowers seem like good people and I think it is great for people to own their own businesses.
lender.occupational_info: I am a firefighter

lender.name: Deirdre
lender.occupational_info: taking care of elderly patients in the hospital

lender.name: Luke
lender.loan_because: I lived in Kenya as a child and know how wonderful and hardworking the people are!
lender.occupational_info: I am an assistant to wealthy people.

lender.name: Lisa & Ronny
lender.loan_because: a good friend who is celebrating his 40th birthday introduced us to Kiva. In honour of this friend\'s birthday, a group of us are attempting to make enough loans to positively affect the lives of 40 different low-income entrepreneurs around the world.

lender.name: Talmadge & Sharon
lender.loan_because: We believe that capitalism and entrepreneurship combined with hard work, smart work, perseverance (and an occasional unexpected blessing) can raise a person from poverty to any level of economic prosperity that he or she can conceive.
lender.occupational_info: We negotiate good prices to purchase real estate properties and derivatives of real estate. Then we \"Add Value\" to our investment and rent, lease or sell it to return a gain that is more than we have invested - hopefully :>)

lender.name: Birgit
lender.loan_because: I realise we are very fortunate in Western Europe, most people here have plenty of opportunities. It makes me feel good to share my wealth and to help other people with it especially because the people asking for loans on Kiva don't expect a free ride but earn it.

lender.name: Allison & Tim
lender.loan_because: We want to make a contribution to the world for those who could use our support to do good things in their countries.
lender.occupational_info: We are students in university. Allison studies Human Development and Tim studies University Administration.

lender.name: Alison & Alistair
lender.loan_because: Have first hand experience with people's ingenuity and entrepreneurialism in different parts of the world. We want to contribute to good ideas that help real people on the ground.
lender.occupational_info: Alison researches environmental and social justice issues and teaches at the University. Alistair writes movies, documentaries, and TV shows.

lender.name: Austin
lender.loan_because: I Want to help people with no money and that need help with their families and their stores
lender.occupational_info: 7th grade student at Keller Middle School

lender.name: Zvi
lender.loan_because: When its paid back, I know it went to something productive and useful.

lender.name: Alex & Caroline
lender.loan_because: I think this is a good cause.

lender.name: Frank
lender.loan_because: Giving people the capital they need to start or expand their business at no interest can really change their lives.

lender.name: Justin
lender.loan_because: I believe that small amounts of capital in the right hands can change the world.
lender.occupational_info: I study international business and negotiate the contractual agreement between my company and our customers (for aerospace products).

lender.name: Avi & Rivka
lender.loan_because: I want to help those born into a less fortunate financial situation than my own and with fewer opportunities for bettering their situation

lender.name: wean
lender.occupational_info:
Organization Profile of WEAN Background Women Entrepreneurs Association of Nepal (WEAN) is a non-profit and a non-governmental organization. Despite the hardship of women in general in Nepal, in the year 1987 a few women entrepreneurs with the desire to organize women entrepreneurs under a single roof came together and formed the Women Entrepreneurs Association of Nepal (WEAN). Over the years WEAN has been seeking to develop new women entrepreneurs meanwhile trying to upgrade the capacity of existing women entrepreneurs. WEAN offers training, marketing assistance, and access to credit, networking and other extension services to urban and rural women entrepreneurs. Marketing assistance is provided by WEAN indirectly to its members through WEAN Co-operative, as sister organization which WEAN helped establish in 1991, as a marketing outlet for women entrepreneurs. Women Entrepreneurs Association of Nepal (WEAN), has over the years been actively involved in the betterment of women in Nepal. With the focus on the entrepreneurship growth for the women in the country, WEAN, for over the years has successfully conducted various trainings, programs and projects focusing primarily on the potential women entrepreneurs who could contribute economically in their locales and the surrounding areas. Recently with the political changes in the society and the growth of violence against women, WEAN has seen the need to address the plight of the conflict affected women who lost their family members and providers to conflict. WEAN feels it is the right time to shift its attention to these people so that the entrepreneurship skills could be developed and instilled on them. This will be a huge benefit to the society economically and also gives these people a chance to provide for themselves as well as their children without depending on others or the state. WEAN will also incorporate a new strategy to train these women in various occupations which traditional have been assigned to the male population of Nepal. By doing this WEAN will try to remove the stigma attached with the gender biased occupations. Objectives of WEAN Increase economic opportunities and create awareness among women entrepreneurs. Enhance business skills of potential and existing women entrepreneurs. Develop and upgrade skill of women entrepreneurs according to market needs. Advocate the role of women entrepreneurs in the new millennium
WEAN Saving and Credit Program Considering the fact that although rural woman had developed new skills and a greater sense of self-esteem and confidence as entrepreneurs after completion of training courses, most of them continued to face lack of access to capital. Therefore, in February 1995, WEAN, using its own allocated capital fund, launched a ‚ÄúRural Savings and Credit Mobilization Program‚Äù to promote and develop micro enterprises run by rural women in Kathmandu valley and Syabrubesi in Rasuwa district. This program adopts a modified Grameen Banking model. Credit is being utilized for a variety of income generating activities, such as vegetable farming, poultry, tourism related services, production of bamboo crafts, handloom textiles, silk tie-dye products, and cloth cut work, incense and handmade paper products. In 1996, WEAN obtained funds in amount of NRs.1,68,000.00 from the Embassy of Australia based in Kathmandu to use as loan money for growing demand of groups in Syabru Bensi area. Micro Credit Program is most extensive and has been highly effective in Rasuwa district as no other NGO‚Äôs has been able to access to the poor women living in the remote mountainous region. In 1997, the credit program expanded further as WEAN was assigned to work with micro Credit Project for Women (MCPW), which is a joint program of HMG‚Äôs Women Development Division and CECI, a Canadian Project. Micro Credit Program of WEAN was running successfully under the MCPW project at Bungamati, Bagdole, Chunnikhel and Lagankhel areas of Lalitpur District. The total loan disbursement was NRs.24,87,500.00 obtained from ADB.

lender.name: Tara and James
lender.occupational_info: We are both lecturers at The University of Sydney, working in IT and astronomy.

lender.name: jean-luc
lender.loan_because: I can afford it

lender.occupational_info: I help people in recovery from drug and alcohol addiction find permanent employment and become self-sufficient.

lender.name: Everett & Louise
lender.loan_because: To whom much is given, much is expected.

lender.name: Frank
lender.loan_because: We are all in this journey together.
lender.occupational_info: manufacture pet food

lender.name: Morgan
lender.loan_because: I believe women can change the world.
lender.occupational_info: I play with light.

lender.name: Kevin & Sherry
lender.loan_because: We feel the best way to move forward is to do so yourself but it is always nice to get a little help from your friends and we feel priviledged to be in a position to do so.
lender.occupational_info: We manufacture and sell t-shirts and other garments mostly with wildlife designs on them.

lender.name: Mark
lender.loan_because: Basically a \"feel good about myself\" thing... It feels good to help others! I hope to be more generous in the future.
lender.occupational_info: I am a station captain at an Air Force Base, Vandenberg AFB, CA. My station is right on the coast and offers a beautiful view of the Pacific and coastal areas. Retirement is drawing near... :o)

lender.name: Matt
lender.loan_because: I want to help people improve the quality of life in their communities.
lender.occupational_info: I manage project teams in the design of water and wastewater treatment plants.

lender.name: Betsy
lender.loan_because: I believe it's our social responsibility to help others lead a successful life, working to continually make positive contributions be they emotional, intellectual, or financial.
lender.occupational_info: I teach business classes to students aged 14-18 years old. My students come from a variety of personal backgrounds. Some live the city of St. Louis and some live in surrounding suburban and rural areas. Some of my students are top athletic and academic performers in our school, while others have special needs due to physical and/or emotional challenges.

lender.name: Melanie
lender.loan_because: I care and want to help entrepreneurs and hard working families expand or grow their businesses. Life has been good to me and my family and I want to share my rewards with others so that their lives can be good as well,
lender.occupational_info: I look for innovative ways to solve problems and try to inspire others to be creative and live their lives to the fullest.

lender.name: Louise
lender.loan_because: I believe in the power of the human spirit at every level- we can ALL change lives. I am in awe of all these resilient entrepreuneurs.

lender.name: Jenny
lender.loan_because: We live in a digital age; thousands of miles can be be travelled in seconds! This is a wonderful way to give.
lender.occupational_info: Purchasing Manager

lender.name: Matthew
lender.loan_because: I want to see decent, hard working people have a chance to change their lives. I believe offering these types of opportunities to people across the world will ultimately benefit everyone.
lender.occupational_info: I manage and develop real estate.

lender.name: Ken
lender.loan_because: Poverty in the world is an artificial creation. It does not belong to the human civilization. -Dr. Muhammad Yunus
lender.occupational_info: CSR , ENVIRONMENTAL CONSCIOUSNESS AND REDUCTION OF WASTE. RENEWABLE ENERGY. POVERTY AND DISEASE ERADICATION

lender.name: Matt and Stephanie
lender.loan_because: Everybody deserves a chance to succeed.
lender.occupational_info: We create and design websites for churches and other organizations.

lender.name: Paul & Carole
lender.loan_because: My brother gave me lottery tickets for my birthday and these loans represent my winnings. I hope my good fortune continues for Kiva entreprenuers.
lender.occupational_info: We both work(ed) for General Electric in New York (chemist & administrative assistant)and have for 66 years (total!).

lender.name: Sandy
lender.loan_because: I believe in the power of being responsible and accountable for one's own life and the freedom that it brings including the leadership that comes forth from that. My vision for the world is that all willing people live their lives experiencing freedom and joy, creating wealth and prosperity and sharing it with those around them.

lender.name: maverick
lender.loan_because: I want to help more people get a better life, and I hope they can in turn help others as well.
lender.occupational_info: I do research in Computer Science.

lender.name: Dave
lender.loan_because: Because microfinance works to grow developing economies, and personal connections via web 2.0 are the best way to do microfinance.
lender.occupational_info: I help companies use computers and technology to be more productive.

lender.name: Andrea
lender.loan_because: Every little bit helps.
lender.occupational_info: I make movies.

lender.name: James
lender.loan_because: It\'s doing things right and lending to a small business owner in a 3rd world country can do the most good.
lender.occupational_info: I work as a Mountain Guide and Ski Patroller.

lender.name: Hilary
lender.loan_because: I realize what a difference a small contribution from several different people can make to a woman\'s life in another part of the world. It\'s exciting to make such a personal connection and to help in this way.
lender.occupational_info: I drove buses for disabled passengers in Toronto for most of my working life. Now I am retired and am volunteering to help build houses through Habitat for Humanity so that people who might not otherwise have a chance to live in their own homes might do so.

lender.name: Mike
lender.occupational_info: I write for television. Mostly for kids\' shows.

lender.name: jackie and stephen
lender.loan_because: It is very easy to feel overwhelmed about the problems facing our world and think that there is nothing we can do to have a positive impact on the lives of others. Kiva give me a way to do just that.
lender.occupational_info: I do hands on bodywork that may include craniosacral therapy, massage, Reiki and other modalities. My only goal with each session is for the client to feel much better physically and emotionally when he or she leaves than when he or she came in. Stephen does customer support for an educational software company. He deals exclusively with people who are having problems with the software. His goal is to solve the problem they present to him and make each caller's day a little better.

lender.name: David
lender.loan_because: We have a responsibility to help those less fortunate. Inequality of wealth will be solved much more easily by creating wealth in poorer nations rather than any form of redistribution.
lender.occupational_info: I help design and manage the factory that makes memory chips for cell phones.

lender.name: Rick and Dana
lender.occupation: Owner of Audio & Video retail Store
lender.loan_because: I beleive we are all connected to one another. I love the fact that I can help someone enpower themselves to create a better life.Hopefully in turn\\r\\nthey will help others. We are here to create our experience.
lender.occupational_info: I have a store of my own. Retail and wholesale of audio and video merchandise, which includes installation and design in automobiles and homes. We create music and video\\r\\nexperience to our clients.

lender.name: Marguerite
lender.loan_because: I live in a country where even those of us who think we dont earn a lot, are incredibly well off compared with others. I want to share a little with people who need a helping hand.

lender.name: Lee4
lender.loan_because: We are emigrants from Africa and understand the challenges that face entrepreneurs in the developing world. Predatory lending practices and non-existent banking infrastructure make starting a business a nightmare. More power to Kiva!

lender.name: Nika
lender.loan_because: I am grateful for everything that has been given to me. I care about the future of this planet, and believe that the only way to build a better future is to give back.

lender.name: Morris
lender.loan_because: if everyone does a little, no one needs to do a lot.

lender.name: Camille
lender.loan_because: I can.

lender.name: Viraj
lender.loan_because: Being of Indian decent and born in Kampala, Uganda I would like to help those who would like to improve not only their lives but of those in their communities.

lender.name: Russell
lender.loan_because: Kiva just seems like a brilliant idea.

lender.name: Douglas
lender.loan_because: to provide opportunities for everybody.

lender.name: Erika
lender.loan_because: I am very interested in learning more about microlending and how it can be used as tool to end poverty both domestic and abroad.
lender.occupational_info: I help revitalize disenfranchised communities through workforce development programs, economic development and affordable housing initiatives, early care and education and youth development programs all supported and sustained by grassroots community building efforts.

lender.name: Josh
lender.loan_because: Got a gift certificate, just trying this out for the first time.
lender.occupational_info: Grocery business at large retailer.

lender.name: Alan
lender.loan_because: People believed in me and loaned me start up capital for my business. It has been very important to me and my family to make my own way through business and I want to share that success. I believe this is a good way to do that.
lender.occupational_info: My company of 30 people builds folding bicycles for transportation, recreation, and traveling. We believe bicycles are one of the worlds great solutions.

lender.name: Matthew
lender.loan_because: everyone deserves a chance

lender.name: Patrisha
lender.loan_because: feel that I am participating directly in our world and individual lives. The philosophy of empowerment makes me feel grateful and proud of all the people involved.
lender.occupational_info: I am an artist and singer. I teach expressive arts in which each student explores creativity and the enormous power within each of us.

lender.name: Steven
lender.loan_because: It is one of the best and most efficient ways to empower friends around the world
lender.occupational_info: Select merchandise which appears on retail shelves

lender.name: David

lender.name: morten

lender.name: Zackery

lender.name: Lau

lender.name: David and Debrianna

lender.occupational_info:
Executive Director of the Melton Foundation, and Senior Editor of Innovations journal
I help people make a positive impact on the world.

lender.name: Asa
lender.loan_because: I enjoy supporting people in developing countries, especially Latin America. I have a soft spot for Mexico, having studied there in college.

lender.name: Christmas Fund
lender.loan_because: I started this fund to give shares to my relatives for Christmas 2006. It started with 4 borrowers and at this point has lent to 22 borrowers (at 6/28/2011) with only one default.
lender.occupational_info: I am a financial analyst in New York City.

lender.name: The C/S Family
lender.loan_because: We believe that it is the duty of those who have been empowered by chance to empower others by choice.
lender.occupational_info: We are a teacher, a nurse, an automotive parts reseller, an office worker, and a computer programmer.

lender.name: Jean Synodinos
lender.loan_because: it's a way to "pay forward" all the kindnesses that have come my way
lender.occupational_info: Public health communications professional, performing songwriter, and author of The Big Scout Project (www.bigscoutproject.com). Life is sweet.

lender.name: Michael/Unlikely Theater
lender.loan_because: I think if you can make the world a better place, well, you ought to. Special thanks to Andrew H, Michelle C, Colleen, Paul, Ramona, Jon B, Rachel, Brian, Julia M, Pat and Laurie and The Unlikely Theater.
lender.occupational_info: I work in a bookstore, run a theater company and I also write stories, plays and movies.

lender.name: Lin
lender.loan_because: I have some to share and believe this is a great way to help people help themselves. I loan also in memory of my sister Dr. Kay Sutherland, who believed in the Kiva.
lender.occupational_info: I am a writer for magazines and I own and run a little horse ranch that has about 20 horses. I am a small business owner, too, one woman who made something out of raw material and a small loan. As a bonus, it\'s what I love to do and it supports me.

lender.name: Carol
lender.loan_because: with greater ability becomes greater responsibility.
lender.occupational_info: I install computer systems

lender.name: Jim
lender.loan_because: I can enter into partnerships directly with others across the world.
lender.occupational_info: My family is my life work and my most enjoyable pasttime.

lender.name: Kaitlin
lender.loan_because: I want to help.
lender.occupational_info: i\'m in high school

lender.name: Barry & Katie
lender.loan_because: If we don't, why should anyone else?

lender.name: Barry and Allegra
lender.loan_because: Poverty is the worst form of violence. ~ Mohandas Gandhi
lender.occupational_info: Allegra is a designer who has a home studio, and Barry is now retired for medical reasons.

lender.name: Tish
lender.loan_because: I can, I want to, and I believe in helping people empower themselves in order to make their lives better.

lender.name: Lavan
lender.loan_because: I think the micro-credit loans are the best way to end poverty !
lender.occupational_info: Highly Math Related

lender.loan_because: ‚ÄúWhen one tugs at a single thing in nature he finds it attached to the rest of the world‚Äù (John Muir)
lender.occupational_info: I am a media strategist, M.B.A. and biologist focused on nature-inspired innovation in the business sector.

lender.name: Tracie

lender.occupational_info: I try to help "horror"monally challenged adolescents learn the skills needed for adult life.

lender.name: aaron
lender.occupational_info: I take photographs for advertisements.

lender.name: Jason,Joy,Canija
lender.loan_because: It honors our Father in Heaven.

lender.name: Kelsey
lender.occupational_info: As a student at a small private college, I study environmental sciences with a focus on marine ecosystems. I also enjoy taking visual arts and French language classes.

lender.loan_because: we can and we care.
lender.occupational_info: We teach and work with kids.

lender.occupational_info: I\'m a college student.

lender.loan_because: I have enough.

lender.loan_because: I want to buy a bus for commuter use
lender.occupational_info: This bus will serve passengers going to the capital city LOME for commercial purpose

lender.name: Denny
lender.loan_because: I have money that I can use to invest in the people of our planet.
lender.occupational_info: I manage a governmental organization that provides services to people with various kinds of physical and mental disabilities.

lender.name: Amanda
lender.loan_because: Humanity as we now know it has drastically taken a turn for the worse as everyone turns their back on one another. If we could all just lend a helping hand to those in need, our purpose in life would be restored. We are one anothers' greatest resource. Peace and Love.
lender.occupational_info: I love dedicating my life to helping others. I am a proud United Way employee and actively working to improve my community, whether it be locally or worldwide, is how I choose to live my life.

lender.name: Christian
lender.loan_because: I can.
lender.occupational_info: I am currently studying to become a physician.

lender.name: Jake
lender.loan_because: Anyone with enough optimism and determination can succeed, but in many environments, people need that first bit of help. I would love to visit some of these entrepreneurs and eat/drink/be merry at their awesome businesses.
lender.occupational_info: I write computer programs used by large companies, which are not nearly as interesting as the bold, important small businesses around the world that provide for their families and communities.

lender.name: Scott Miritello
lender.occupational_info: Dr. Scott Miritello is a Doctor of Chiropractic Medicine and an Independant Medical examiner. He is also certified in Impairment Rating, Acupuncture and Physiotherapy.

lender.name: Nicholas
lender.loan_because: I am impressed by this alternative of micro-credit because it circumvents the troublesome (and often exploitative) nature of the IMF and the World Bank. Visionaries like Muhammad Yunus and the owners of KIVA are true revolutionaries, and I'm proud to be part of such a practical and helpful program.
lender.occupational_info: I work at the Mayor's Office in Lansing, MI. where I hope to learn enough about local government to influence the right people to create programs that effectively pull people out of poverty. My second goal is to positively shape Lansing's environmental policy.I also attend college to study philosophy and political science.

lender.name: Joseph
lender.loan_because: I feel capitalism can help people. Welfare states have created a mess. Giving people hand outs does not help people, it makes them slaves. But empowering people can help improve there lives.

lender.name: Christine
lender.loan_because: these entrepreneurs inspire me.

lender.name: rashi
lender.loan_because: It will help people that are trying to work hard at helping themselves

lender.name: Chad
lender.loan_because: Life is short, precious, delicate and in need of help in many parts of the World.
lender.occupational_info: I am a pre-law student majoring in history who hopes to do some good in the World when my time comes.

lender.name: James
lender.loan_because: Because if they don't pay back I break their legs and I enjoy that. Or I can sing to them till they pay me back so I shut up. It's always their choice.
lender.occupational_info: I make sure that when you watch movies from America they look larger then life and the people are prettier then regular people. We Americans believe it is far better to be pretty then substantial in my estimation.

lender.name: Jennifer
lender.loan_because: it's simply the right thing to do.

lender.name: Crystal
lender.loan_because: I loan because I care....
lender.occupational_info: I am a teacher.

lender.name: Michael
lender.loan_because: i can, I should,

lender.name: Alan
lender.loan_because: Putting up signposts.
lender.occupational_info: I'm a product manager for iContact, an Email Marketing Software company.

lender.name: Max Wei
lender.occupational_info: Trying to make my way back to something useful, with many detours and wrong paths taken along the way. The forest is night and dark and the path winding.

lender.name: The Boogyman
lender.loan_because: If enough people help out these businesses, then maybe it will help these countries to support themselves. This is better than charity because we're encouraging financial responsibility. Instead of sending food, we're helping countries develop to the point where maybe they won't need our help. The people that get loans from Kiva are the most important building blocks of developing economies.

lender.name: Jeremy
lender.loan_because: This world isn\'t fair. Wealth comes from hard work (20%?) and luck (80%?). I think it\'s the responsibility of those who have all their needs met to share some of their luck, some of their opportunity, with those who for whatever reason have been put at a disadvantage.
lender.occupational_info: I\'m the supervisor at a residence for people who struggle with mental health issues. We provide tenants with one meal a day, medication support, and whatever help they need to achieve their goals.

lender.name: Carlotta and Gary
lender.loan_because: It's the best way to support the Millenium Development Goals: one person at a time! The picture is in March 2007 at Kibera, Kenya at a microenterprise training class graduation where Kiva checks were passed out by Ebony, Inc. a Kiva field partner. Training was done by the Daystar University SIFE Team. We had the priviledge to take part in the ceremonies. Asante!
lender.occupational_info: We teach at Kennesaw State University. Also check out our students' page: www.kiva.org/lender/kennesawstatesife7024

lender.name: Sonali
lender.loan_because: Joanna Newsom says EAT LESS DAIRY!!
lender.occupational_info: well, i go to school [normal and boring] but at night i stalk the undead--that is i hunt and kill zombies.

lender.name: Jennifer
lender.loan_because: I think this is a great way to help people
lender.occupational_info: I teach 7th grade science

lender.name: Pearl
lender.loan_because: I can.

lender.name: David & Heather
lender.loan_because: Microlending brings us joy and inspires us. Microlending is also very popular amoung David\'s clients and students. It\'s great to have one\'s charitable giving continue on year after year to new people in need of a micro-loan.
lender.occupational_info: Heather is a worry doctor who talks with people about problems they are having and their feelings and helps them to feel better. David writes books about building financial freedome and giving back to the world (e.g. through charitable giving).

lender.name: Ashish
lender.loan_because: I was born and raised in Kenya and unlike these people, I was fortunate enough to have lived a somewhat easy life. I feel that this is the least I can do to help people in the country that made me who I am today!

lender.name: sharon
lender.loan_because: I love this concept and that my little bit is meaningful to someone, their family and community.
lender.occupational_info: Mostly I write content and take photos for school system website and local newspapers; encourage community goodwill among & between our students, teachers, and schools.

lender.name: Tim
lender.loan_because: I\'d like to see everyone get a chance to succeed. Hard work combined with good ideas should be rewarded.
lender.occupational_info: I help my company by paying the employees and taking care of their needs so that the employees can spend more time serving the customers.

lender.name: Rachel
lender.loan_because: I want to help people.
lender.occupational_info: I love genealogy.

lender.name: Maggie
lender.loan_because: I want to share the abundance I have received
lender.occupational_info: I care for terminaly ill patients until they pass away. It is a priviledge to be a part of thier journey from this life. I love my work.

lender.name: Denman
lender.loan_because: God has been good to me, and this is a way that I can help others directly, rather than through the government
lender.occupational_info: I represent a company in the high technology industry promoting their products to semiconductor companies. Now I do this from home using the internet and telephone.

lender.name: Devendra
lender.loan_because: I\'m glad to make a positive difference in whatever little way I can.

lender.name: Ron & Kathleen
lender.loan_because: I think someone feels much better when they can achieve something on their own by borrowing and paying back rather than being given a handout.
lender.occupational_info: I help other people to manage, save and invest their money

lender.name: Deanna
lender.loan_because: I believe in the spirit of people and know that if given the chance, people will make great things happen and build a kingdom.
lender.occupational_info: I am a fashion designer. I women's apparel that is solely manufactured in Los Angeles.

lender.name: Nancy
lender.loan_because: the world will be a better place when we all connect on a personal level. Today I loan, and tomorrow I may need to borrow.
lender.occupational_info: I am interested in people\'s stories -- how they came into their business, how they manage work and family, and what are their dreams for the future.

lender.name: Kacey & Bob
lender.loan_because: we have been blessed in life and want to pay it forward. We all deserve a chance in life.

lender.name: Betsy
lender.loan_because: maybe it will make a difference.......
lender.occupational_info: I teach English as a Second Language at an inner city high school.

lender.name: Maureen
lender.loan_because: In today\'s world of corporate greed, I am happy to be in the financial position to lend directly to a fellow hard working individual. John Lennon said it best \'Power to the people\'.

lender.name: Peter & Anja
lender.loan_because: We want to help people to help themselves and their families out of poverty for the long term.

lender.name: Jan
lender.loan_because: the need is so great and I've been so blessed.

lender.name: Rosalind
lender.occupation: environmental health scientist and fiction writer
lender.loan_because: for me, true humanity means fully participating in the world community.

lender.name: Mary Ann
lender.loan_because: I care about all people on the planet who need help to survive.
lender.occupational_info: Office work consists of answering phones, typing, filing, greeting the publc

lender.name: Anthony
lender.loan_because: spirituality has led me to a commitment to social justice; I can do without some luxuries so others can have a better life.
lender.occupational_info: Pranic Healing is what I do. It involves working on people\'s subtle energy structure to facilitate physical, emotional, mental health. I also teach meditation.

lender.name: Jennifer B.
lender.loan_because: This'll get me into heaven, right?

lender.name: David Pye
lender.loan_because: I can. And therefore feel as if I should. I hope that someone would do the same for me given a change in circumstances.
lender.occupational_info: I help businesses determine what keyword phrases their target markets use to search for the products they are selling, and then help them rank well in serach engines for those keywords. That is a gross generalization - there\'s a lot more to it.

lender.name: Jason
lender.loan_because: It makes me feel good to know that I can help my neighbors around the world. Hopefully, helping these folks to expand their businesses, help their families, or having bigger crops will help our planet grow and bring each one of us just a little closer together.
lender.occupational_info: I am an ISO coordinator and technical writer for a chemical company just outside of Houston, TX.

lender.name: adamk
lender.loan_because: I want to make the world a better place. Even if it is only $25 at a time.
lender.occupational_info: 3g graphics and animation.

lender.name: SusanNepaliKeroseneQueue
lender.loan_because: I'm passing onward the help I've received in my life.
lender.occupational_info: Over the years, I've become a feminist and reproductive and GLBT rights advocate. I've taught biology, worked as an educator for Planned Parenthood, and been a landlady. I'm married and raised two sons. I"ve lived in Nepal. I've learned to do plumbing (working with water pipes and such), electrical, and other building maintenance tasks. Now I can spend more time with my grandchildren, fixing up my own house - and lending on Kiva !

lender.name: Tom
lender.loan_because: This is such a great idea!

lender.name: Kristen
lender.loan_because: there is no better way to directly help a stranger remotely (besides giving to my non-profit). How could anyone resist?
lender.occupational_info: MBA student at UC Irvine, The Paul Merage School of business

lender.name: Stephen
lender.loan_because: I have the means to, and it feels good to help someone who is working to better their circumstances.
lender.occupational_info: I manage a video library for a large telecommunications company. I edit simple programs, and I make copies for whoever needs them.

lender.name: Robyn
lender.loan_because: See the world with a new perspective.
lender.occupational_info: I toil away with book learning!

lender.name: Gary Mac
lender.occupational_info: I own and operate three internet websites specializing in shaved ice and snow cone supplies. Snow cones are like crushed ice in a cup topped with flavored syrup. We sell over 70 different flavors and ship worldwide.

lender.name: Emily
lender.loan_because: I am keen to help these businesses succeed

lender.name: Joyce
lender.loan_because: I believe in the idea of someone trying to make a better life through hardwork and have found most of those willing to try to be excellent investments!

lender.name: George
lender.loan_because: I want to help people who truly want to be helped.

lender.name: Arilotta
lender.loan_because: Everybody should have the opportunity to set up or improve his own business

lender.name: Bob and Jamila
lender.loan_because: We can afford it and it is a privledge to be of some help.

lender.name: Shawn
lender.loan_because: When Kiva was first explained to me, I was really impressed and knew it was something for me. If you have not joined Kiva, I encourage you to do so today. You will be glad you did.

lender.name: Joyce
lender.loan_because: I loan because I can!
lender.occupational_info: I teach public benefit organizations how to work with business and I help businesses see the benefit of working with public benefit organizations.

lender.name: KitKat
lender.loan_because: Grameen Bank had stopped taking donations by the time I found out about it. I want microfinancing to be well-run and truly micro for as long as it takes to get everyone out of extreme poverty.
lender.occupational_info: I fix the errors in some documents for a large company.

lender.name: Nicolao
lender.loan_because: It works and gives a good feeling

lender.name: Sharon
lender.loan_because: I would like to do my small part to help someone succeed . I feel that I have been blessed in life and would like to share something with others.
lender.occupational_info: Right now, I am a homemaker. My daughter and granddaughter are living with us temporarily, so this keeps me busy. I also volunteer in the community and am active in my church.

lender.name: BrandFamily
lender.loan_because: We feel a bond with our global neighbors in Africa, largely due to our friendships with 3 young girls from the African Children\'s Choir.
lender.occupational_info: Teacher, Nurse, Students, Family.

lender.name: Andrea
lender.loan_because: I can

lender.name: Brandon
lender.loan_because: I am interested in helping hard working people in developing countries.
lender.occupational_info: I am a computer programmer in a rapidly growing software company.

lender.name: Tim
lender.loan_because: I have been fortunate enough to receive loans when I most needed them. Now it is time to give back to someone who is deserving of the same.
lender.occupational_info: I am an entrepreneur. I was a medical doctor, but realized that I wanted to do more in life. I began starting other businesses, some failed and some succeeded. The successful ones have given me freedoms I never had before.

lender.name: Jamie
lender.loan_because: I believe in small business. I believe and trust in people.
lender.occupational_info: Air Pollution Control - emissions reduction technology

lender.name: Neal
lender.loan_because: I want other people to succeed.

lender.name: Peter and Monica Irvine
lender.loan_because: Everyone deserves the opportunity to participate in the global economy. We support primarily women-owned businesses with prospects for growth and a track record of repaying previous micro-credit loans.
lender.occupational_info: Monica works for an international non-profit in the environmental field and Peter works for the government in the aviation field.

lender.name: Ross
lender.occupational_info: I make movies

lender.name: Rena
lender.loan_because: I want to change the world.

lender.name: Damien
lender.loan_because: I feel that helping the world is my first and greatest duty.

lender.name: Deborah
lender.loan_because: I want to see "the little guy" succeed! I have come to believe microlending is a very important part of people's ability to improve and grow their small businesses.
lender.occupational_info: I help to decide where houses, businesses, and streets will be built to make a better community for the people who live there.

lender.name: Joshua Dziabiak
lender.loan_because: We make a living by what we get, but we make a life by what we give.

lender.name: Mark, Nanda, & Annie
lender.loan_because: We want to help support everyone's desire to lead a happy, successful life.
lender.occupational_info: Mark & Nanda both work to support our family, and little Annie goes to day care all day.

lender.name: Irma
lender.loan_because: I want to help others help themselves and their families to a better life

lender.name: nik and melissa
lender.loan_because: man make pretty rocks. bang rocks. rocks are good.
lender.occupational_info: I hunt food and paint caves and bang rocks together for fun while my gorgeous companion writes beautiful fiction in her spare time (when she is not wreaking criminal havoc foiling the good intentions of superheroes).

lender.name: Corinne
lender.loan_because: I now can

lender.name: Bill
lender.loan_because: I have a fortunate life and enjoy being able to directly support hard working people who are trying to improve their lives and, thereby, the world we all share.
lender.occupational_info: Charting a course on new seas.

lender.name: Helen
lender.loan_because: Studying Development Economics, I've realised how important it is to incite people to make things happen for themselves.

lender.name: Cheikhou
lender.loan_because: I would like to improve other people life

lender.name: Alex
lender.loan_because: I think this is a great way to help people in third world countries.
lender.occupational_info: I am a fiction writer, and an investor in real estate and business start ups.

lender.name: Joe
lender.loan_because: I want to enable those who have the desire and drive to succeed but are limited due to circumstances beyond their control.

lender.name: Valerie
lender.loan_because: because I can!
lender.occupational_info: I am a teacher of science and history for students in rural Australia.

lender.name: Benjie
lender.loan_because: I think it is a good way to help.
lender.occupational_info: I do electrical work on commercial and industrial buildings, sometimes houses.

lender.name: nx2c.com
lender.loan_because: I would like to participate in enabling many people, all over the world, to be successful. And maybe someday, celebrating their success with them, in person.
lender.occupational_info: I am a registered nurse working in a busy, city-hospital emergency room.

lender.name: indieSpring
lender.loan_because: indieSpring believes that all people should be able to support themselves and their family through a willingness to work hard and establish a business. Investing, rather than giving, is the greatest sustainable way of helping those less fortunate than ourselves.

lender.name: NABUKENYA
lender.loan_because: i want to start up a small modern Saloon in our city so as to uplift my stardards of living.
lender.occupational_info: As a teacher, our pay is so so so little to cater for my needs and i would like at least to add on something to push me going.

lender.name: Angela
lender.loan_because: "Then shall the King say unto them on his right hand, Come, ye blessed of my Father, inherit the kingdom prepared for you from the foundation of the world: For I was an hungred, and ye gave me meat: I was thirsty, and ye gave me drink: I was a stranger, and ye took me in: Naked, and ye clothed me: I was sick, and ye visited me: I was in prison, and ye came unto me. ... Verily I say unto you, Inasmuch as ye have done it unto one of the least of these my brethren, ye have done it unto me." - Matthew 25:34-36, 40

lender.name: Cecilia
lender.loan_because: I believe that microloans are the way to improve life for all.

lender.name: Rhonda & Jack
lender.loan_because: Everyone deserves a chance.
lender.occupational_info: We are wild blueberry farmers in Maine.

lender.name: Joe & Betty
lender.loan_because: we're lucky enough to have something to give.

lender.name: Sam and Jeff
lender.loan_because: We can!
lender.occupational_info: We are outdoor experiential educators.

lender.name: adoo
lender.loan_because: I have been blessed and I want to share that blessing.
lender.occupational_info: I design web sites and business identities such as logos and cards and signs.

lender.name: Michelle
lender.loan_because: I believe in helping those who help themselves. I have needed help in my life and I just want to return the opportunity to people who genuinely will better themselves and their communities.
lender.occupational_info: I help people feel better.

lender.name: Doug
lender.loan_because: I can
lender.occupational_info: I teach surgery for the university in my home town.

lender.name: Three Nails
lender.loan_because: We can help people easily while building a portfolio that can continue to offer help over time.
lender.occupational_info: We are a small house church movement in the United States. We meet in our houses and gather together throughout the week to worship and spend time with one another.

lender.name: Jenny
lender.loan_because: I am unable to make BIG donations that will really change the world, but loaning and re-loaning funds to those who need it most will multiply the funds I have, AND help others meet basic needs.
lender.occupational_info: I sell computer stuff. to make it possible for large companies to have access to the internet and to keep their info safe.

lender.name: Dave
lender.loan_because: it's the right thing to do.
lender.occupational_info: I help people when their computer has problems.

lender.name: Karen
lender.loan_because: I believe it is important to help each other.

lender.name: Gia
lender.loan_because: Kiva is a well-vetted organization also recommended by Pres. Bill Clinton himself as an effective organization to work with. Since 2007 both loans that I've given have been paid back in full. It's been a great way to help people in the world - Kiva is a nice vessel to use, a nice place to start to assist. A loan to business creates jobs, commerce and economy and even political stability- in extreme cases. Through Kiva a simple $25 can even effectively help someone else in the world while not "breaking your budget."

lender.name: Data Mobility Group LLC
lender.loan_because: Kiva loans pay in dividends not available with traditional investing - the satisfaction of knowing that we are helping those in need.
lender.occupational_info: We explain people, process and technology challenges and opportunities to businesses around the globe.

lender.name: Carol & Roger
lender.loan_because: We want to help people who show initiative and are trying to help themselves and their family/community
lender.occupational_info: Retired medical social worker and university professor

lender.name: David
lender.loan_because: I believe that helping people who need a little to get started can help alleviate world poverty.
lender.occupational_info: I am the former editor of a weekly newspaper, now retired and writing in weekly newspapers in my area on a free-lance basis.

lender.name: John+Jen=Finn+Bodhi
lender.loan_because: we can and we believe that we should support those less fortunate than us, especially those who are challenging their abilities and the system to better themselves and their families while inspiring others to do the same

lender.name: Phil
lender.loan_because: Mohammed Yunus has set a great example. As you hand it out, it will be handed back.
lender.occupational_info: Electronic components sales such as components to cellphone makers.

lender.name: Kymberlie R. McGuire
lender.loan_because: It's hard to pull yourself up some times and everything I can do to help someone else is well worth it.
lender.occupational_info: I do technical support for a company that creates weblog software. This means that I help people get their blogs up and running so they can communicate with friends, family, or colleagues.

lender.name: Erik & Diana
lender.occupation: IT Snr Project Manager & Channel Sales Mgr
lender.loan_because: We want to help people starting or improving their business. By loaning directly to the person we hope our money will help them and doesn\'t disappear into a large organization
lender.occupational_info: I work as an IT project manager, implementing software within a large corporation.

lender.name: John
lender.loan_because: People need people not governments.
lender.occupational_info: I dig a hole and plant something.

lender.name: Hugh
lender.loan_because: As a former Peace Corps volunteer and USAID small business development contractor, I've seen how a little money in the right hands can go a long way.

lender.name: Nap
lender.loan_because: investing in Africa is investing in the redemption of the whole planet.
lender.occupational_info: I make music and use vocals to convey a conscious message.

lender.name: Elisabeth & Bill
lender.loan_because: We are atheists. Since we do not believe in supernatural intervention, we want to help make the world a better place.

lender.name: Samantha and Adrian
lender.loan_because: We want to help other people

lender.name: Island Literary Salon
lender.loan_because: We want to share our good fortune.
lender.occupational_info: We are a group of women with various jobs and backgrounds, who share a love of reading and being with each other as good friends.

lender.name: Rob & Jenn
lender.loan_because: We want to help provide people with opportunities that they would not otherwise have.

lender.name: Amanda
lender.loan_because: I just love the idea of this. It\'s so much more personal to be able to hand pick where your money will be going and see the face of the person you\'re helping out.
lender.occupational_info: Well, I pretty much just go to school. I\'m going to school to recieve my degree in International Studies with a concentration in International Social Justice. That basically will help me try and make the world a better place by helping the people who need help the most and maybe live in a place where there are a lot of problems.

lender.name: Marc Rigaux
lender.loan_because: I can.

lender.name: Colleen
lender.loan_because: A little can go a long way.

lender.name: bryan
lender.loan_because: I like the idea of helping people with their ideas for how to improve their lives not my ideas.
lender.occupational_info: I find exciting ways to teach people about science in museums. I specifically am interested in how technology can be helpful in this process.

lender.name: Jason Peery Family
lender.loan_because: We want to help people move forward!

lender.name: Benno
lender.loan_because: To further free enterprise throughout the world. It is the small businesses that create wide-spread prosperity.
lender.occupational_info: Looking for new opportunities...

lender.name: Martin
lender.loan_because: I think that kiva can really make a difference and I want to be part of this.
lender.occupational_info: I work at a business school and work with executives around the world

lender.name: Joe L.
lender.loan_because: It's the right thing to do!!
lender.occupational_info: Helping people live healthier, longer, lives.

lender.name: Yee Siau
lender.loan_because: The world's wealth is not equally distributed.

lender.name: Larry
lender.loan_because: takes money to make money
lender.occupational_info: entrepreneurial

lender.name: Sandra
lender.loan_because: It is a tangible way to make a difference in our world
lender.occupational_info: I work in a University program, teaching parents.

lender.name: Jesper Larsson
lender.loan_because: I like the idea behind micro credits; helping people help themselves, simply by giving them a chance to a loan.
lender.occupational_info: I work with Creative Social Responsibility

lender.name: james
lender.loan_because: I want to "lend" a helping hand
lender.occupational_info: I sit at a desk in front of a computer

lender.name: Jason McVicar
lender.loan_because: it is the right thing to do. Organizations such as Kiva are the counter current to the vast flow riches toward the rich.
lender.occupational_info: I am a medical student in Winnipeg, Manitoba.

lender.name: Christopher
lender.loan_because: I want to stay involved in a community I used to be a part of but which I am no longer able to visit frequently.
lender.occupational_info: I am a member of a team that manages credit card call centers in India and the Philippines.

lender.name: Sara
lender.loan_because: I have been helped by strangers and my life has been made better for it. I would like to do the same for someone else.
lender.occupational_info: I teach in a high school for teenage mothers.

lender.name: Julia
lender.occupational_info: My company helps businesses overcome challenges they are facing

lender.name: Mary
lender.loan_because: We are all connected.

lender.name: Ryan
lender.loan_because: I loan because I have traveled to Africa, Southeast Asia, Central America and India for my work with an NGO and I am always amazed at how hard people are willing to work to make their lives and their families lives better. I honestly believe that if we work as partners with people to give them the tools they need to educate and empower themselves and those around them that they will lift themselves out of poverty.
lender.occupational_info: I work as a consultant with banks and financial firms, I also work with one of the big environmental NGO's to develop financial plans for conservation throughout the world

lender.name: Ryo
lender.occupational_info: Student

lender.name: Ryan
lender.loan_because:
I believe in attempting to help people get back up on their feet again and have seen and heard many success stories. Many people don't want simple charity, they want the opportunity to earn a living for themselves which really is better in the long term is better because it offers them independence and stability.
I also believe this is one of the best methods for combating poverty around the world.
lender.occupational_info:
I am a student, going to university so that I can be trained to become a pastor at a church.
Right now I teach teenagers at my church and do bible studies and Sunday school with them.

lender.name: Justin
lender.loan_because: I have been given much!

lender.name: Alanna
lender.loan_because: It‚Äôs a privilege to support women microentrepreneurs across the world.

lender.name: Josephine & Royal
lender.loan_because: We've decided not to make additional loans until Kiva stops sponsoring loans to cockfighting businesses. We've enjoyed being part of Kiva and we respect the good work this organization is doing, but we believe everyone has the responsibility not to promote gratuitous cruelty.
lender.occupational_info: Josephine studies and teaches writing at a college, and Royal works for the Department of Health, analyzing ground water contamination.

lender.name: Alice & Oliver
lender.loan_because: because we have been given much, we too must give!

lender.name: Yuri
lender.loan_because: The only thing more fulfilling than building your own successful business is helping someone else build theirs.
lender.occupational_info: I help teams build software for large companies to manage the flow of work across their organizations.

lender.name: Liz
lender.loan_because: I think this is a fantastic way to lend money to people and by getting regular updates you can see how your money is making a difference to someone elses life!
lender.occupational_info: i have too much work... not so much fun

lender.name: Nicole
lender.loan_because: How could you not help any way you could? I know if tables turned I would be gracious for anyone who believed in me and my abilities.
lender.occupational_info: I work in a hospital setting helping women who may or are losing their pregnancies by delivering their babies too early. I also teach students nursing.

lender.name: julien
lender.loan_because: C\'est une mani√®re efficace de venir en aide sans arrogance, pour permettre aux personnes plus d√©favoriser de r√©aliser leurs r√™ves

lender.name: Vicki
lender.loan_because: This is such a simple way to help people we are interconnected with, but will never meet.

lender.name: Terry & Denise
lender.loan_because: We think Kiva is a great way to help others. We have been fortunate in our lives and would like to help others have an opportunity to make their lives better.
lender.occupational_info: We live in Saudi Arabia where Terry is an exporation geophysicist.

lender.name: richard
lender.loan_because: I want to be able help those who help themselves. This seems to be a great way doing that.\r\nGood Luck!

lender.name: Jean-Claude
lender.loan_because: It is such a wonderful idea, and the whole process so simple to participate in!

lender.name: stephane
lender.loan_because: It's fun

lender.name: Warren
lender.loan_because: I want to have a connection with people across the world, and to share the resources that God has blessed me with.
lender.occupational_info: I help seniors with a variety of needs, so that they can continue to live independently.
